channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #新西兰政府称中国国家支持的组织入侵议会
item.description:
#BREAKING NZ govt says Chinese state-sponsored group hacked parliament pic.twitter.com/kcWFo5lwwK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 金球奖组织者表示，金球奖已与一家美国电视网签订了为期五年的转播协议，在此之前，金球奖经历了几年的低谷。
item.description:
The Golden Globes has inked a five-year broadcast deal with a US TV network, organizers said, after a troubled few years for the awards show.https://t.co/jg5GBmgK24

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 自亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）接管 X 社交网络以来，该平台上的错误信息和仇恨言论激增。
item.description:
US court rejected social network X's lawsuit against a nonprofit that had reported a spike in misinformation and hate speech on the platform since billionaire Elon Musk's takeover.https://t.co/wQByvpQps2 pic.twitter.com/RBCxwobUlW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 奥地利顾问迈克尔-沃迪奇卡（Michael Woditschka）清楚地记得，有一天他因与一名十几岁的男孩发生关系而被警察传唤，随后被法庭定罪。
item.description:
Austrian consultant Michael Woditschka well remembers the fateful day when he was summoned by police over his relationship with a teenage boy and subsequently convicted in court.https://t.co/cobs9XEC90 pic.twitter.com/YluFgduUyD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 本周，当乔-拜登（Joe Biden）与巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）在纽约举行的选举筹款活动中登台亮相时，这对在白宫共同度过了近十个年头的二人组合将笑逐颜开。
item.description:
When Joe Biden takes the stage with Barack Obama at an election fundraiser in New York this week, it will be all smiles for a duo who collectively have spent nearly a dozen years in the White House.https://t.co/9EJA1H5RAs pic.twitter.com/JxUvZRxfSv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #普京称莫斯科袭击者试图前往乌克兰，并询问 "为什么
item.description:
#BREAKING Putin says Moscow attackers tried to go to Ukraine, asks 'why' pic.twitter.com/F8IaGefjme

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 分析人士说，周五对莫斯科音乐厅的袭击加剧了人们的担忧，即类似的行为可能会袭击西欧的目标，而西欧今年夏天正在举办格外引人注目的体育赛事。
item.description:
Friday's attack on a Moscow concert hall is exacerbating worries that similar acts could hit targets in western Europe which is hosting exceptionally high-profile sports events this summer, analysts say.https://t.co/kx7Yw1duZL pic.twitter.com/7FgluIdoS1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #普京称莫斯科袭击是 "伊斯兰激进分子 "所为
item.description:
#BREAKING Putin says Moscow attack committed by 'radical Islamists' pic.twitter.com/loPpEziM6G

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰防空系统在首都上空击落两枚俄罗斯导弹，金属碎片坠落地面，包括一名少女在内的十人受伤。
item.description:
Ten people including a teenage girl were wounded after Ukrainian air defence systems downed two Russian missiles over the capital, sending metal debris crashing to the ground.https://t.co/a6AakIc1XZ pic.twitter.com/kRjYuyXFaE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #联合国专家指责以色列在加沙实施种族灭绝。
item.description:
#BREAKING UN expert accuses Israel of committing genocide in Gaza. pic.twitter.com/nZMjIfHrHC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 欧盟一项禁止森林砍伐衍生产品的法律将于 2024 年底生效，但对巴西原住民来说，该法律存在一个无法忍受的漏洞：巴西广袤的热带稀树草原塞拉多（Cerrado）被排除在该法律的适用范围之外。
item.description:
An EU law banning deforestation-derived products comes into effect at the end of 2024, but for Brazilian Indigenous people it contains an unbearable loophole: the Cerrado, Brazil's vast wooded savanna, is excluded from its scope.https://t.co/l9yla9cleH pic.twitter.com/0Tx5y2VAee

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #法官定于 4 月 15 日开始审理特朗普封口费案
item.description:
#BREAKING Judge sets April 15 for start of Trump hush money trial pic.twitter.com/SFckbHRfh2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #英国政府将两起针对民主机构和议员的 "恶意 "网络攻击事件归咎于中国
item.description:
#BREAKING UK government blames China for two 'malicious' cyberattacks against democratic institutions, parliamentarians pic.twitter.com/rktn5gyDTz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 波兰外交部周一称，俄罗斯巡航导弹上周末侵入波兰领空后，俄罗斯驻华沙大使未出席对其发出的传唤 ➡️。
item.description:
Poland's foreign ministry said on Monday that the Russian ambassador in Warsaw failed to show for a summons issued after a Russian cruise missile breached Polish airspace over the weekend ➡️ https://t.co/Pc6TQFbCGA pic.twitter.com/bfMS45Iaer

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 西班牙后卫达尼-卡瓦哈尔（Dani Carvajal）周一表示，西班牙在与巴西的友谊赛前没有种族歧视，这场友谊赛的安排是为了支持反对种族主义的斗争 ⬇️ #AFPSports #ESPBRA
item.description:
Spain defender Dani Carvajal on Monday said his country was not racist ahead of a friendly against Brazil arranged to support the fight against racism ⬇️ https://t.co/oKqaacpyFg #AFPSports #ESPBRA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇫🇷 巴黎服务员争当全城最快的服务员数百名围着围裙的服务员参加了在法国首都举行的比赛，旨在奥运会前展示服务员的职业风采 ➡️

VIDEO: 🇫🇷 Paris waiters compete to be fastest in the city

Hundreds of aproned waiters took part in the race in the French capital designed to show off the profession ahead of the Olympic Games ➡️ https://t.co/CfTKIhq3kz pic.twitter.com/zkuMUYgWYX

item.title: #塞内加尔反对党候选人即将获胜，执政阵营展开激烈争夺 📸 @wesselsjohn1 @mlongari

#Senegal opposition candidate closing in on victory, ruling camp contests.#AFP 📸 @wesselsjohn1 @mlongari pic.twitter.com/V89AhdfRyI

item.title: 周一，西班牙一名法官改变方向，停止执行其有争议的命令，即暂时中止 Telegram 在该国的消息应用程序，等待警方对该公司的报告 ➡️。
item.description:
A Spanish judge on Monday reversed course and halted his controversial order to temporarily suspend messaging app Telegram in the country pending a police report on the company ➡️ https://t.co/NuTh5F4IWD pic.twitter.com/0OFrebnlAT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇫🇷 巴黎服务员争做全城最快的服务员数百名围裙服务员参加了在法国首都举行的比赛，比赛的目的是在奥运会之前展示服务员的职业风采 ➡️ 📹 @MariePoupinel
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇫🇷 Paris waiters compete to be fastest in the city

item.title: 巴西前国脚丹尼-阿尔维斯今年 2 月在西班牙被判犯有强奸罪，法院周一表示，他已缴纳 100 万欧元保释金，可以在上诉期间离开监狱。
item.description:
Former Brazil international footballer Dani Alves, convicted of rape in Spain in February, has paid his bail of one million euros and can leave jail pending his appeal, a court said on Monday pic.twitter.com/AQUx4w6dtF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #欧盟根据新数字法调查苹果、谷歌母公司 Alphabet 和 Meta
item.description:
#BREAKING EU probes Apple, Google parent Alphabet, Meta under new digital law pic.twitter.com/5bS8uLtP5W

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据法新社记者报道，周一基辅市中心发生数次爆炸，乌克兰首都拉响了空袭警报，官员们敦促居民躲避➡️。
item.description:
Several blasts rang out in central Kyiv on Monday, AFP journalists reported, as air raid sirens sounded in the Ukrainian capital and officials urged residents to take shelter ➡️ https://t.co/edoNmOAw6a pic.twitter.com/6mZVMZOdSS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #中国表示支持联合国安理会关于加沙 "立即 "停火的新决议草案
item.description:
#BREAKING China says supports new UN Security Council draft resolution on 'immediate' Gaza ceasefire pic.twitter.com/4Cmk3niRDa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯瑟琳罹患癌症的消息一经公布，社交媒体上关于她健康状况的各种猜测，包括她已经去世的猜测，引起了人们的反感。但无休止的阴谋论并未停止...
item.description:
Conspiracies linger.

The revelation that Catherine, the Princess of Wales, has cancer prompted a backlash over the torrent of lurid social media speculation around her health, including by those positing she was dead. But the endless churn of conspiracy theories has not stopped… pic.twitter.com/6YDiASUfCY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 贝尔格莱德一栋被炸毁的建筑是1999年北约袭击塞尔维亚的国家象征，它可能很快会成为唐纳德-特朗普女婿出资建造的豪华酒店，这令塞尔维亚人非常愤怒。
item.description:
VIDEO: Serbians angry at Trump family deal for site of NATO bombing.

A bombed-out building in Belgrade, which has stood as a national symbol of the 1999 NATO strikes on Serbia, might soon become a luxury hotel financed by Donald Trump's son-in-law -- much to the anger of… pic.twitter.com/8D1w1IM6Jg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #法国内政部长杰拉尔德-达尔马宁（Gerald Darmanin）表示，周一已在全国范围内开展了数次被称为 "XXL 清理行动 "的大规模缉毒突击行动。
item.description:
#BREAKING French Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin says several major anti-drug raids dubbed "XXL cleanup operations" have been launched Monday across the country pic.twitter.com/JUFX6kNmmQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #巴布亚新几内亚北部发生 6.9 级地震，洪水泛滥，官员们周一表示，估计有 1,000 所房屋被毁，救灾人员正在赶往该地区。
item.description:
#BREAKING An estimated 1,000 homes were destroyed after a magnitude 6.9 earthquake rocked flood-stricken northern Papua New Guinea, officials said Monday as disaster crews poured into the region pic.twitter.com/2aOgFoHu8v

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 4月1日，在澳门赛马会从政府获得的赛马经营特许权终止后，这个中国南部的赌场中心的赛马比赛将退出历史舞台。
item.description:
Macau horse racing enters its final furlong.

On April 1, horse racing in the southern Chinese casino hub will be consigned to history after the club's concession from the government to operate racing was terminatedhttps://t.co/cClzJItPti pic.twitter.com/HWwfXrtjsu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科音乐厅袭击事件造成 137 人死亡，四名嫌疑人被还押候审，所有四名嫌疑人均被指控犯有恐怖主义罪。
item.description:
Four suspects remanded in custody over Moscow concert hall attack killed 137 people.

All four suspects have been charged with terrorism.

Russia observed a national day of mourning on Sunday following the attack claimed by the Islamic Statehttps://t.co/HC1uZhFT7f pic.twitter.com/PMMPiOPiJw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 加沙遭到轰炸，联合国负责人谴责 "恐怖和饥饿"......要求立即停火并停止以色列派兵进入拉法的计划的呼声日益高涨。
item.description:
Gaza bombed as UN chief decries 'horror and starvation'.

Appeals are growing for an immediate ceasefire and a halt to Israeli plans to send troops into Rafahhttps://t.co/6uNrgMd6yl pic.twitter.com/cadZEzCnyy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024
